name: Mad Trax (mitzischmitzi, PfandBoss, kookroach)
description: In this local two player game, players take on the role of either an otter or a cat, each with their own train. The objective of the game is to destroy the other player's train by shooting cannons at it. Players can move their train back and forth along the track to avoid enemy fire, and must strategically choose when to shoot their cannons in order to hit the other player's train. The player who successfully destroys the other player's train first wins the game.
